teethdweller.minigame.title: Brush Your Teeth!
teethdweller.minigame.instructions: Click and drag across the teeth to brush them!
teethdweller.message.no_teeth: You can't eat without teeth! Visit a dentist!
teethdweller.message.cooldown: You need to wait before brushing again.
teethdweller.message.infected_clean: Your teeth feel cleaner... but something still feels wrong.
teethdweller.message.dweller_spawn: AAAARGH! Something horrible bursts from your mouth!
teethdweller.message.teeth_lost: The Teeth Dweller has emerged! You've lost all your teeth!
teethdweller.message.visit_dentist: Visit a dentist to get new teeth...
